message: Let's split it evenly, no need to negotiate
I'll give you a slightly less generous offer, but still a good one!
That's a pretty lopsided deal, I'm not giving up 2/3 of the money that easily!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but still keep most of the money for myself
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more
You're getting closer, but I'm not willing to give up 40% of the money yet
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not willing to give up control
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think this is the last chance for a good deal
I was hoping for a better deal than a 45-55 split, I'll wait for another chance
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
I'm not willing to give up on getting a fair deal, let's try again!
Seriously? You're offering the same deal as last time? I'm not falling for it
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm not giving up yet
I'm not going to give up, I think I can get a better deal if I try again!
You're really not getting any more creative, are you? I'm not accepting this offer either
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
I'm not going to accept your ultimatum, I'll take the risk of getting nothing rather than accepting this unfair deal!
Fine, you win. I'll accept your offer. But next time, let's play a fair game
